scenario.sendMessageSIP: REGISTER sip:[domainName] SIP/2.0 To: "[userName]" <sip:[userName]@[domainName]> From: "[userName]" <sip:[userName]@[domainName]>;tag=[localTag] Call-ID:[newCallId] CSeq: [newCseq] REGISTER Via: SIP/2.0/[transportResponse] [Adresse-Tester];branch=[newBranchId] Max-Forwards: [MaxForwards] Contact: <sip:[userName]@[Adresse-Tester]> Allow: [msg] Route: <sip:[userName]@[Adresse-Server];transport=[transportRequest];lr> Route: <sip:[Adresse-Tester];transport=[transportRequest];lr> Content-Length: 0

then.sendMessageSIP: REGISTER sip:[domainName] SIP/2.0 To: "[userName]" <sip:[userName]@[domainName]> From: "[userName]" <sip:[userName]@[domainName]>;tag=[localTag] Call-ID:[newCallId] CSeq: [newCseq] REGISTER Via: SIP/2.0/[transportResponse] [Adresse-Tester];branch=[newBranchId] Max-Forwards: [MaxForwards] Contact: <sip:[userName]@[Adresse-Tester]> Allow: [msg] Route: <sip:[userName]@[Adresse-Server];transport=[transportRequest];lr> Route: <sip:[Adresse-Tester];transport=[transportRequest];lr> Authorization: Digest username="[UserName]", realm="[WWWAuthRealm]", nonce="[WWWAuthNonce]", response="[AuthResponse]", uri="[URI]" Content-Length: 0

scenario.sendMessageSIP:
PUBLISH sip:[userName]@[domainName] SIP/2.0 To: "[userName]" <sip:[userName]@[domainName]> From: "[userName]" <sip:[userName]@[domainName]>;tag=[localTag] Call-ID:[newCallId] CSeq: [newCseq] PUBLISH Via: SIP/2.0/[transportResponse] [Adresse-Tester];branch=[newBranchId] Max-Forwards: [MaxForwards] Allow: [msg] Supported: path Expires: 600 Event: presence Route: <sip:[userName]@[Adresse-Server];transport=[transportRequest];lr> Route: <sip:[Adresse-Tester];transport=[transportRequest];lr> Content-Type: application/pidf+xml Content-Length: auto
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <presence xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf" entity="sip:[userName]@[domainName]"> <tuple id="[tupleId]"> <status> <basic>open</basic> </status> <deviceID xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:data-model"> mac:00116700b20b </deviceID> <note>My Communicator</note> </tuple> </presence>

then.sendMessageSIP:
PUBLISH sip:[userName]@[domainName] SIP/2.0 To: "[userName]" <sip:[userName]@[domainName]> From: "[userName]" <sip:[userName]@[domainName]>;tag=[localTag] Call-ID:[newCallId] CSeq: [newCseq] PUBLISH Via: SIP/2.0/[transportResponse] [Adresse-Tester];branch=[newBranchId] Max-Forwards: [MaxForwards] Allow: [msg] Supported: path Expires: 600 Event: presence Route: <sip:[userName]@[Adresse-Server];transport=[transportRequest];lr> Route: <sip:[Adresse-Tester];transport=[transportRequest];lr> Content-Type: application/pidf+xml Content-Length: auto Authorization: Digest username="[UserName]", realm="[WWWAuthRealm]", nonce="[WWWAuthNonce]", response="[AuthResponse]", uri="[URI]", opaque="[WWWAuthOpaque]"
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <presence xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf" entity="sip:[userName]@[domainName]"> <tuple id="[tupleId]"> <status> <basic>open</basic> </status> <deviceID xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:data-model"> mac:00116700b20b </deviceID> <note>My Communicator</note> </tuple> </presence>
